description: Classic marinara sauce topped with whole milk mozzarella cheese.
Classic marinara sauce topped with whole milk mozzarella cheese.
Classic marinara sauce, authentic old-world pepperoni, all-natural Italian sausage, slow-roasted ham, hardwood smoked bacon, seasoned pork and beef.
Classic marinara sauce made of 100% California grown vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh mushrooms, fresh red onions, fresh green bell peppers, Roma tomatoes and black olives.
